description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Glittering Snare]

You take -4 status penalty to Stealth checks. The glitter continues to fall around the creature until completely removed, leaving a trail behind it as it moves and revealing its rough location; the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden], rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected], to any creature that can see the glitter whenever it would otherwise have been undetected.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
